description:
It didn't occur to me how many guys I actually met in Brazil until I was going though the last of my tapes. Here are a few of the guys we auditioned during our stay:
Hot and hairy with a great smile. Really got into talking dirty to our female translator.
Cute face and body, but very quiet, shy, and nervous.
Young and lean with a great swimmer's build. Didn't say much but seemed very intent at getting off.
title: Auditions 11
